data.title: Turkey National Football Team News, Fixtures and Results
data.meta_description: Latest Turkey national football team news, results and fixtures plus updates on the Turkish head coach and squad here.
data.text:
Netherlands 2-1 Turkey - Euro 2024 RECAP: Live score, team news and updates as own goal seals a thrilling comeback to set up semi-final against England

Recap Mail Sport's live blog of Netherlands vs Turkey in the last of four quarter-final clashes. As the Turks look to cause another upset against the Dutch after sending Austria crashing out.

Euro 2024 yellow card and suspension rules: How many games players will miss as Spain's Dani Carvajal sees red against Germany... Plus the other players at risk of missing semi-final clashes including five England stars

How long of a ban will Carvajal have to serve for his red card and who else risks missing out of playing in a Euros semi-final as the rest of the quarter-final games play out.

Police arrest 19 people after thousands of Turkish fans hit the streets in Germany to celebrate Euro 2024 last-16 win - with one officer injured and firecrackers aimed at cops

SHEKHAR BHATIA IN DUSSELDORF: More than 3000 people celebrated in the Horst and Bismarck areas of the city and a mob mocked riot police.

Turkey defender Merih Demiral facing calls for UEFA ban over 'banned gesture linked to far-right extremist group' with probe launched after Euro 2024 win against Austria

The centre-back's controversial celebration after his second goal has prompted a probe by the governing body over alleged 'inappropriate behaviour'.

Arda Guler praised by fans for his 'cold' reaction after Turkey's second goal to Austria supporters who threw cups at him... as they claim teenage wonderkid 'already has that Real Madrid mentality'

Turkey wonderkid Arda Guler has been hailed by fans for his 'ice cold' reaction to their second goal against Austria, as his country sealed a place in the Euro 2024 quarter-finals.

Euro 2024 quarter-finals confirmed: Fixtures, schedule and where to watch as hosts Germany face Spain, England take on the Swiss and it's Ronaldo vs Mbappe

The quarter-finals for Euro 2024 have finally been confirmed.Gareth Southgate's England team who find themselves on the 'easier' side of the draw have been paired against Switzerland.

Galatasaray complete permanent signing of Chelsea winger Hakim Ziyech on a free transfer after loan spell last season

The Blues spent £34m to sign the Moroccan from Ajax in 2020, but despite winning the Champions League with the London club, he struggled to fit into the changing nature of the Chelsea team.

Euro 2024 Round-of-16 TV picks in full as England look to make the most of favourable draw and France given blockbuster tie with Belgium

The European Championships round-of-16 gets underway on Saturday, June 29 and this is where you can watch every game.

Revealed: Fan footage shows Turkey's Kaan Ayhan taunting a Czechia star before a mass brawl ensues between both sets of players following their dramatic Euro 2024 clash

A mass brawl broke out between both sets of players following the full time whistle in Czechia's Euro 2024 match against Turkey on Wednesday night.

Czechia 1-2 Turkey: 10-man Czechs are knocked out as Cenk Tosun's injury-time strike earns win for Vincenzo Montella's side... who face Austria next

OLIVER HOLT IN HAMBURG: It was a pulsating game awash with rage and fury. Czechia staged a comeback that unsettled Turkey and gave them plenty of anxious moments

Georgia 2-0 Portugal - Euro 2024 RECAP: Minnows upset the odds (and Cristiano Ronaldo) to book last-16 place and ensure England will play Slovakia... with Turkey through after 2-1 win

Re-live Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Georgia take on Portugal in their final game of group F.

Argentine referee who sent off 10 PLAYERS in one match will take charge of Scotland's crunch Euro 2024 clash against Hungary tonight

Steve Clarke's side can still qualify for the knockout stages of the tournament, but will need to beat Hungary and hope Switzerland suffer defeat by Germany in order to finish second.

Cristiano Ronaldo broke character with a gloriously unusual moment in Portugal's 3-0 win over Turkey - but expect an inquest after absurd pitch invasions from selfie-hunting fans, writes RIATH AL-SAMARRAI

RIATH AL-SAMARRAI: What an unusual moment it was from this ageing great, whose capacity to spring a surprise at 39 has outlasted his ability to dominate opposition the way he once did.

Fans wax lyrical about Cristiano Ronaldo after he dropped a defender with step overs during Portugal's clash with Turkey

The 39-year-old was back at it once again against Turkey as he dropped defender Abduelkerim Bardakci to the ground with step overs before delivering a cross to Rafael Leao.

Turkey 0-3 Portugal - Euro 2024 RECAP: Cristiano Ronaldo and Co qualify for last 16 in a crazy contest

Relive Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Turkey take on Portugal in their second game in Group F.

Inside 'Little Istanbul', where Germany's 1.5million Turks are painting Cologne red ahead of crunch Euros clash with Portugal

IAN HERBERT IN COLOGNE: A mere draw for Turkey against Portugal in Dortmund and they will be dancing and singing in the streets of every host city.

The football transfer that's sparked death threats to a child: Former Chelsea star Michy Batshuayi's wife wipes her Instagram comments with her husband on the verge of the summer's most controversial move

Batshuayi is out on contract at the end of this month, with the 30-year-old Belgian forward reportedly poised to move across Istanbul to join Fenerbahce's bitter rivals Galatasaray.

Jude Bellingham reveals which Real Madrid wonderkid will be even better than him with the youngster already doing 'incredible things' in training

After emerging onto the scene as a prodigious talent at Birmingham, Bellingham move to Borussia Dortmund in 2020 where he would play 132 games and crop up on Real Madrid's radar.

Argentinian referee who once sent off 10 PLAYERS in one match will take charge of Turkey vs Georgia at Euro 2024

Facundo Tello is the only non-European taking charge of a match in the Euro 2024 group stages and arrives with a fearsome reputation.

Turkey 3-1 Georgia - Euro 2024 RECAP: Tournament debutants fall to defeat in enthralling encounter with Real Madrid teenager Arda Guler inspiring his country to win with stunning strike

Relive Mail Sport's live blog for Turkey vs Georgia for all the build-up, live score and action from the Group stage of Euro 2024.

Why Turkey and Czech Republic are now called Turkiye and Czechia as name change causes confusion among Euro 2024 fans

Many fans tuning in to watch Turkey and Czech Republic at Euro 2024 tonight may be confused as they will likely realise that the countries are actually called Turkiye and Czechia.

Why is there no 2pm Euro 2024 game today? UEFA scheduling explained as fans expecting to tune into midday kick-off are in for a shock

It has been five days since Euro 2024 kicked off in Germany on Friday and football fans have quickly adapted their routine to revolve around the three matches taking place each day.

Supercomputer predicts who is most likely to crash out of Euro 2024 early with current holders Italy among the tournament favourites in the most danger - but should England fans be concerned?

Euro 2024 is here and many will be looking at their nation's path to the final. But for some there appears to be serious cause for concern that they will not make it out of the group stage.

From a World Cup winner, to a Barcelona legend... to someone who played for Sussex County side Southwick FC! The playing careers of the 24 managers at Euro 2024 before they swapped the pitch for the dugout

The cream of Europe's top stars head into the tournament looking to make their mark, but there's plenty that already have among the coaching staff in their playing careers.

Euro 2024 kits ranked: France have gone retro, while Scotland have tapped into their tartan roots... but which team will have the best and worst shirts in Germany this summer?

Most of these kits have already had their first outing in recent international breaks, with England first sporting their new look in friendlies against Brazil and Belgium in March.

Euro 2024 10 stars to watch: DANNY MURPHY picks out the 21-year-old we'll all be drooling over, a resurgent striker who's a threat to England and a defender wanted by Liverpool and Man United

DANNY MURPHY: I've rarely seen a player dribble past opponents with such ease and I'd be amazed if we aren't all drooling over the 21-year-old.

Two Barcelona prodigies, a Man United transfer target and a Champions League winner with Real Madrid... the 10 teenage talents set to light up Euro 2024

With 2024's Young Player of the Tournament award up for grabs, plenty of suitors will be looking to make a name for themselves and add their name to an already illustrious list.

EURO 2024 TEAM GUIDE - Georgia: Tournament debutants and rank outsiders aiming to spring a huge surprise in Germany with a former Champions League winner at the helm

Having fallen at the final hurdle in qualification for Euro 2020 - losing to North Macedonia 1-0 in a play-off - the Georgians beat Greece on penalties to book their spot in this year's tournament.

FIFA World Rankings for all Euro 2024 teams... Gareth Southgate's Three Lions are favourite to lift the trophy HOWEVER two other teams rank higher on FIFA's list heading into the competition

Excitement is building for the 2024 UEFA European Championship's as Germany are set to host the hotly anticipated tournament this month. Here is where all 24 teams rank with FIFA,

Euro 2024 squad deadline day: When Gareth Southgate and Co will have to submit their final squad lists for Germany this summer

The countdown for Euro 2024 is well and truly on as the final pieces of the puzzle are being put together. So when will the final squads be named? Here is everything you need to know.

Jose Mourinho 'agrees to become Fenerbahce's new manager on a two-year deal'... five months after his bitter sacking from Roma

Jose Mourinho has reportedly reached an agreement to become the new Fenerbahce on a two-year contract. The Portuguese boss is set to replace Ismail Kartal at the Turkish giants.

Euro 2024 kits revealed: How each nation will look in their swanky new home and away strips when they step out on the pitch for this summer's tournament in Germany

Once the club football season ends, there is just the small matter of a European Championship for football fans to get their teeth in to.

Fenerbahce 'consider joining five European leagues - with the club wanting to leave the Turkish Super Lig over claims of unfair treatment from authorities' following shocking brawl with Trabzonspor fans

Mail Sport reported last week how the club were threatening to withdraw from the league and the Turkish giants now have their eyes set on potential competitions to join.

Fenerbahce 'threaten to WITHDRAW' from Turkish Super League as club president claims they 'cannot tolerate' how they are treated... after shocking scenes where rival Trabzonspor fans attacked players with no action taken

The club's members will evaluate the matter at an extraordinary general assembly meeting on April 2. Their ire has been provoked after rival Trabzonspor fans attacked their players this month.

Former Turkey international dies aged 44 after suffering with a ruptured blood vessel which left him 'fighting for his life' two years ago

Martin had spells at some of Turkey's most prominent clubs, including Besiktas and Trabzonspor having come through the ranks as a striker at the academy of German club Nuremberg.

Assaulted Turkish referee Halil Umut Meler returns to officiate his first match since being punched by disgraced former Ankaragucu president Faruk Koca in wild scenes after a top-flight game

Meler was assaulted on the pitch at the end of a top-flight game on December 11 and subsequently taken to hospital with injuries including a minor fracture.

Altay Bayindir is set to become Man United's No 1 as Andre Onana heads to the AFCON... so who is the unknown £4.3m Turkish keeper the £47m man fears losing his place to?

Bayindir might have been a little surprised to reach Christmas and still not play a single minute for his new club. But his opportunity is just around the corner now.

Turkish football set to restart on December 19 after season was suspended when referee was hospitalised with a cheek fracture following attack from club president

Media outlets branded Monday a 'night of shame' - when MKE Ankaragucu president Faruk Koca launched a vicious attack on Halil Umut Meler after his side drew 1-1 against Caykur Rizespor.

Turkish president who floored referee with a punch won FAIR PLAY award last season - and once saved President Erdogan

Faruk Koca stormed onto the pitch after his team MKE Ankaragucu conceded a late equaliser against Caykur Rizespor, resulting in a 1-1 draw, and punched the match official in the face.

Turkish football president who punched referee screamed 'I will kill you' as he was being kicked on the ground, victim reveals: Arrested club official admits he 'went crazy' after 97th-minute penalty cost them victory

MKE Ankaragucu president Faruk Koca appeared to be incensed at Meler for awarding a 97th-minute penalty kick that allowed visiting Caykur Rizespor to leave Ankara with the draw.

Battered and bruised in a neck brace in hospital, Turkish ref who was punched by team's president and kicked on the floor is seen for the first time since the incident which fractured his eye socket

The Turkish referee who was punched to the ground and kicked in the head has been seen in hospital for the first time, battered and bruised and wearing a neck brace.

Turkish ref says 'It's MY fault' after he's punched by club's president and kicked on the floor, leaving him with cheek fracture, then rescued by cops as fans throw missiles following 97th-minute goal

MKE Ankaragucu president Faruk Koca launched the vicious attack on referee Halil Umut Meler after his side drew 1-1 against Caykur Rizespor in Turkey's Super Lig.

Disgraceful scenes as referee in Turkish top-flight football match is BATTERED to the floor by home team's President then kicked in the head as he lies prone - after rivals scored a 97th minute equaliser: Attacker is under police guard in hospital

After the final whistle, Halil Umut Meler was confronted by a visibly furious Faruk Koca, who aimed a punch at the official in abhorrent scenes caught on camera.

GRAEME SOUNESS: No threat, no end-product and no goals... with Jeremy Doku now Man City's go-to player, Jack Grealish needs to have a close look at himself

GRAEME SOUNESS: Ask 10 full-backs if they'd rather play against Doku or Grealish, and I think it would be Grealish every time. Defenders don't like pace and players who are direct.

Wales 1-1 Turkey: Dragons head for Euro 2024 play-offs after being held in Cardiff as Yusuf Yazici's equaliser from the spot cancels out Neco Williams' early opener... but bullish Rob Page backs his side to qualify the hard way

WALES 1-1 TURKEY - TOM COLLOMOSSE AT THE CARDIFF CITY STADIUM: For 36 minutes, Wales' dream of qualifying for a third consecutive major tournament was tantalisingly close.

Wales 1-1 Turkey - Euro 2024 qualifier LIVE: Dragons heading for play-off as it stands after conceding equaliser with Croatia leading

Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest scores, team news and updates as Wales travel to Turkey with ther Euro 2024 status in the balance.

Thomas Muller sarcastically hits out at Germany fans after Turkish supporters took over the Olympic Stadium in Berlin in their 3-2 friendly win

The DFB had anticipated a different outcome in their match against Turkey in Berlin on Saturday evening.

REVEALED: Third most successful manager of all-time retires after an illustrious career, behind Pep Guardiola and Sir Alex Ferguson

Hailing from Romania, he primarily pursued his coaching career in Eastern Europe. He ranks second only to Sir Alex Ferguson in terms of major managerial honours.

Meet the unlikely best team in Europe! Stacked with Premier League rejects from Man United, Chelsea, Southampton and Bournemouth... this club have won ALL 18 of their games this season

The team in question have won all nine of their league fixtures to top the table and have also won all nine of their matches in the Europa Conference League so far.

Andrea Pirlo allowed his Italian players to SMOKE at half-time when he was in charge at Turkish side Karagumruk, claims his former player Colin Kazim-Richards

Pirlo last less than one campaign with the side before he was sacked with three games left to play in the 2022-23 season as the club languished ninth in the table.

Manchester United apologise for the 'unacceptable' situation after hundreds of Galatasaray supporters ended up in the home end during Tuesday's Champions League clash as they blame 'bots' for the problem

LIAM MORGAN: The club then launched an investigation into how so many away supporters were able to infiltrate home sections of the ground and published their initial findings on Friday.

Ex-Arsenal star Mesut Ozil is 'in contention to become Turkish national team general manager' just six months after retirement... with Joachim Low 'a candidate to take over as head coach'

Ex-Germany boss Joachim Low is viewed as a possible contender to succeed Kuntz as head coach, with Mesut Ozil reportedly lined up to replace Altintop as general manager.

Wales are handed double injury blow ahead of decisive Euro 2024 qualifier against Latvia as Wayne Hennessey and Wes Burns are both ruled out

Goalkeeper Wayne Hennessey and wing-back Wes Burns have withdrawn from the Wales squad to play Latvia on Monday.

Tottenham outcasts Davinson Sanchez and Tanguy Ndombele join Galatasaray

Sancez leaves on a permanent deal worth £12.8m, after the Colombian earlier received interest from several clubs including Spartak Moscow and Nottingham Forest this summer.

Juan Mata 'is set for Japan move after rejecting Saudi offers' as former Man United and Chelsea star follows in Andres Iniesta's footsteps to join Vissel Kobe

Juan Mata, the 35-year-old World Cup-winning midfielder, has chosen a move to Japanese club Vissel Kobe, according to The Athletic.

Aston Villa announce signing of Nicolo Zaniolo to bolster squad ahead of European return... as Midlands club suffer two injury blows to Emiliano Buendia and Tyrone Mings

Aston Villa have signed Italy midfielder Nicolo Zaniolo on a loan deal from Galatasaray. The 24-year-old becomes the Premier League club's fourth first-team signing of the summer.

Mauro Icardi and Dries Mertens appear to LAUGH at Wilfried Zaha after the former Crystal Palace winger's poor touch during their Champions League qualifier

It was the Ivorian forward's second run out in an orange shirt and he impressed on the night.The 30-year-old showed off his lightning footwork to the Galatasaray fans.

Nottingham Forest make approach for Atalanta's Merih Demiral and are willing to pay £17m, but Turkish international could need convincing to join Steve Cooper's side

Nottingham Forest have made an approach for Atalanta defender Merih Demiral. The 25-year old Turkey international is available this summer as Atalanta re-shape their squad.

UK and Ireland are set to win the race to host Euro 2028 as rivals Turkey pull out and switch their bid to the 2032 tournament

The United Kingdom and Ireland have been handed a huge boost in their pursuit to host Euro 2028 as Turkey have asked UEFA to jointly bid for Euro 2032.

Tottenham ACCEPT £12.9m bid for Davinson Sanchez from Spartak Moscow, but other clubs including Galatasaray remain keen on the out-of-favour defender

The 54-time Colombian international faced the embarrassment of being booed by his own fans last season when he lasted just 23 minutes before he was subbed off during a 3-2 defeat to Bournemouth .

Wilfried Zaha completes Galatasaray move as Turkish side confirms the Crystal Palace legend's arrival on a three-year deal as a free agent

The 30-year-old winger was a free agent after his Crystal Palace contract expired earlier this summer, and has now joined the Turkish giants on a thee-year deal.

Barcelona director Deco 'felt sold out by Fenerbahce' after missing out on Arda Guler - as the club 'invited him to Turkey' only to sell the teenage starlet to bitter rivals Real Madrid

Guler, 18, was closing in on a summer move to Barcelona before Real Madrid swooped in with a late offer above the Turkish wonderkid's £15million release clause.

Joan Laporta insists Barcelona were right NOT to sign 'Turkish Messi' Arda Guler as he explains why rivals Real Madrid won the race for the wonderkid

The 18-year-old, dubbed the 'Turkish Messi', completed a move to the Spanish capital for just £15million thanks to a release clause in his Fenerbahce contract.

Galatasary make a move for Tottenham outcast Davinson Sanchez as Ange Postecoglou continues to rebuild his squad... while Spurs remain in talks for Dutch defender Micky van de Ven

SIMON JONES: The Colombian international faced the embarrassment of being booed by his own fans last season when he he was subbed off during a 3-2 defeat to Bournemouth.

Steven Gerrard holds talks with Wilfried Zaha over £16m-per-season Saudi move... but the deal is set to collapse amid anger the Crystal Palace star is 'holding Al-Ettifaq to ransom'

The deal is on the brink of collapse due to anger from Saudi officials working on behalf of Al-Ettifaq amid claims Zaha's advisors are trying to negotiate more money from the deal.

Fenerbahce wonderkid Arda Guler, 18 - dubbed the Turkish Messi - is being tracked by the likes of Real Madrid, Man City and Liverpool - and could leave for less than £15m

SIMON JONES: Guler, 18, has featured right across the midfield, with the wonderkid tending to play most of his minutes for the Turkish giants on the right side of the attack.

Turkey 2-0 Wales: Rob Page's side are consigned to a second successive defeat after Joe Morrell is sent off to dent their Euro 2024 qualifying hopes

TOM COLLOMOSSE: Turkey's 18-year-old sensation Arda Guler curled in a brilliant second in the closing stages after fellow substitute Umut Nayir had put the home side one up.

Ilkay Gundogan caused fury in Germany by posing with President Erdogan - but desire to be a role model in his family's home drives him on... now he's back in Turkey to help Man City win the Treble

WILL PICKWORTH IN ISTANBUL: Cenk Tosun joined the pair in meeting the Turkish president but the photo, shared by Gundogan, was accompanied by the caption: 'My President'.

Head for Turkey, join Ronaldo and Benzema in Saudi Arabia, or take on a higher standard - but brighter spotlight - in Italy or Spain... Where could Man United send Mason Greenwood on loan?

As Mail Sport revealed on Thursday, officials are looking into a move that would see the 21-year-old forward play abroad for a year. So where could Greenwood head to?

Joao Felix fuels speculation around his future after following Galatasaray on Instagram... as the Turkish side's president refuses to rule out a move for the Chelsea loan flop

Felix is set to leave Madrid this summer due to his strained relationship with manager Diego Simeone, and he won't be returning to Chelsea after they opted against making his loan move permanent.

Dele Alli is SLAMMED by Besiktas chief for not being 'what they expected'... as the Turkish side's president insists he hopes the midfielder 'recovers as a human' following disastrous loan spell

Alli joined the club on loan from Everton last summer with the hope of reviving his career, but more failure has followed with the former England man netting three times in just 15 games.

Dele Alli is BANISHED from Besiktas squad and told to watch the remainder of the season from the stands by manager Senol Gunes as the Turkish club turn down the chance to sign him permanently for £8million after disastrous loan spell

Dele Alli has reportedly been told to watch the remainder of the Besiktas' season from the stands by manager Senol Gunes, as the on-loan Everton midfielder's miserable spell in Turkey continues.

Body of ex-Premier League star Christian Atsu will arrive back in his homeland Ghana today after his tragic death in devastating earthquake in Turkey

Atsu was found dead on Saturday following the devastating earthquake in southern Turkey and northern Syria. Atsu's brother and sister were present when his body was recovered.

WATCH: Christian Atsu's final goal was a match-winning free kick for Turkish club Hatayspor just hours before the devastating earthquake struck... with the ex-Premier League star's body now found under rubble

He played for Hatayspor in Antakya, Hatay Province, which was affected heavily by the natural disaster in southern Turkey and northern Syria which is known to have killed more than 40,000 people.

Ex-Premier League star Christian Atsu's body is found under rubble 12 days after devastating earthquake in Turkey

Several search and rescue operations in the debris of the building where Atsu and Hatayspor's sporting director Taner Savut lived, took place - with Savut also missing following the devastating earthquake.

'The people depend on our help': Ilkay Gundogan and his wife send two truck-loads of bread to support victims of devastating earthquake in Turkey... as the Man City star insists 'it is ESSENTIAL that we all stick together'

More than 17,000 people have been killed and thousands more injured after a 7.8-magnitude earthquake rocked Turkey and Syria earlier this week, while millions have been left homeless.
